front.title: Extensible In-band Processing (EIP) Architecture and Framework

author.organization: Univ. of Rome Tor Vergata / CNIT

abstract.t: Extensible In-band Processing (EIP) extends the functionality of the IPv6 protocol considering the needs of future Internet services / 6G networks. This document discusses the architecture and framework of EIP. Two separate documents respectively analyze a number of use cases for EIP and provide the protocol specifications of EIP.
